overview.en: EOS Chrome Korea IBCT team proposed a new solution to Block Chain 3.0, EOS Chrome enhanced consensus algorithm, added ICC (Inner Contract Communication), using Burn & Earn DPos mechanism to maximize platform de-centralization, is expected to start testing in April 2019
overview.zh: EOS Chrome韩国IBCT团队对区块链3.0提出的新的解决方案，EOS Chrome增强了共识算法，新加了ICC（Inner Contract Communication），采用Burn & Earn DPos机制以最大程度实现平台的去中心化，预计2019年四月份开始公测
